overview: Yan Hongwei is in distress because the first three girlfriends he had have all left and he nearly died of a broken heart. Even more unfortunately, he was unemployed and when cornered , his friend introduced him to the Water Yang which was a business deal. The deal was as long as he 's within a month to the lovelorn girl he can earn 100,000 yuan. To obtain the good things of beauty and money , Yan Hongwei has to learn let go.
title: The Womaniser
